entry.title: PPLNS with job declaration
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around a specific formula presented in Section 3.3, which seems to puzzle the person in question due to difficulties in visualization and intuitive understanding. The formula in focus is: \(\sum_{j=k_1}^{k_2} score_f(s_j) + .. + \sum_{j=k_{t-1}}^{k_t} score_f(s_j) = t\). The query seeks an elaboration or demonstration that could simplify the comprehension of how this formula operates or stands to be true from an intuitive standpoint. The request underscores a need for clarity on the mathematical representation and its application, indicating that while the formula appears logically sound, the practical visualization or conceptual grasp remains elusive.
